channel.description: Recent content in sugar on funPlantGenes

item.title: Abi5
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Zm00001eb218990 Gene Symbol: Abi5 Gene Name: ABI3-VP1-transcription factor 5 Genome: Zm-B73-REFERENCE-NAM-5.

item.title: ABI51
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Zm00001eb413890 Gene Symbol: ABI51 Gene Name: ABI3-VP1-transcription factor 51 Genome: Zm-B73-REFERENCE-NAM-5.

item.title: AcERF182
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Acc04742 Gene Symbol: AcERF182 Gene Name: Genome: Actinidia chinensis (Red5) Species: Actinidia chinensis Functional Descriptions: AcERF182 may play an important role in the accumulation of soluble sugar metabolism via direct regulation of the transcription of AcBAM3.

item.title: BnERF2.4
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: BnERF2.4 Gene Name: Ethylene response factor BnERF2-like Genome: Species: Brassica napus Functional Descriptions: Ethylene response factor BnERF2-like (ERF2.

item.title: BrOG1A
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: BraA08002322 Gene Symbol: BrOG1A Gene Name: Orphan gene 1 Genome: B.

item.title: BrOG1B
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: BraSca000221 Gene Symbol: BrOG1B Gene Name: Orphan gene 2 Genome: B.

item.title: BZ1
item.description: Gene Details: MSU gene ID: LOC_Os08g28730 RAPdb gene ID: Os08g0374800 Gene Symbol: BZ1 Genome: MSU7 , IRGSP-1.

item.title: CitSUS5
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CitSUS5 Gene Name: sucrose synthase 5 Genome: Citrus Genome Database Species: Citrus reticulata Functional Descriptions: Expression analyses and functional characterizations of CitSUS5 and CitSWEET6 support their proposed role in regulating fructose and glucose levels, hexose to sucrose ratio, and sucrose synthase cleavage activity.

item.title: CitSWEET6
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CitSWEET6 Gene Name: sugars will eventually be exported transporter 6 Genome: Citrus Genome Database Species: Citrus reticulata Functional Descriptions: Expression analyses and functional characterizations of CitSUS5 and CitSWEET6 support their proposed role in regulating fructose and glucose levels, hexose to sucrose ratio, and sucrose synthase cleavage activity.

item.title: CitZAT5
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CitZAT5 Gene Name: ZINC FINGER OF ARABIDOPSIS THALIANA Genome: Citrus Genome Database Species: Citrus reticulata Functional Descriptions: The transcription factor CitZAT5 modifies sugar accumulation and hexose proportion in citrus fruit.

item.title: ClAGA2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Cla97C04G070460 Gene Symbol: ClAGA2 Gene Name: alkaline alpha-galactosidase Genome: Species: Citrullus lanatus Functional Descriptions: Through a genome-wide association study, the alkaline alpha-galactosidase ClAGA2 was identified as the key factor controlling stachyose and Raf hydrolysis, and it was determined to be specifically expressed in the vascular bundle.

item.title: ClGH3.6
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Cla97C05G096220 Gene Symbol: ClGH3.6 Gene Name: Genome: Citrullus lanatus (Watermelon (97103) v2) Species: Citrullus lanatus Functional Descriptions: Expression of the indole-3-acetic acid-amido synthetase gene ClGH3.

item.title: ClINV
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Cla97C10G201810 Gene Symbol: ClINV Gene Name: Genome: Citrullus lanatus (Watermelon (97103) v2) Species: Citrullus lanatus Functional Descriptions: Transcriptome analysis showed that the invertase gene ClINV was the only gene involved in sucrose metabolism that was upregulated in mutant flesh.

item.title: ClNAC68
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Cla97C03G059250 Gene Symbol: ClNAC68 Gene Name: Genome: Citrullus lanatus (Watermelon (97103) v2) Species: Citrullus lanatus Functional Descriptions: The NAC transcription factor ClNAC68 positively regulates sugar content and seed development in watermelon by repressing ClINV and ClGH3.

item.title: ClSWEET3
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Cla97C01G000640 Gene Symbol: ClSWEET3 Gene Name: Sugars Will Eventually Be Exported Transporter 3 Genome: [watermelon reference v2 genome](http://cucurbitgenomics.

item.title: ClTST2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Cla000264 ; Cla97C02G036390 Gene Symbol: ClTST2 Gene Name: Tonoplast Sugar Transporter gene2 Genome: latermelon database 97103 V1 Species: Citrullus lanatus Functional Descriptions: Molecular and biochemical analyses indicated that ClTST2 encodes a vacuolar membrane protein, whose expression is associated with tonoplast uptake and accumulation of sugars in watermelon fruit flesh cells.

item.title: ClVST1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Cla97C02G031010 Gene Symbol: ClVST1 Gene Name: vacuolar sugar transporter Genome: watermelon genome database Species: Citrullus lanatus Functional Descriptions: Report a novel vacuolar sugar transporter (ClVST1) identified through map-based cloning and association study, whose expression in fruit phloem is associated with accumulation of sucrose (Suc) in watermelon fruit.

item.title: CmTST2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CmTST2 Gene Name: tonoplast sugar transporter2 Genome: Species: Cucumis melo Functional Descriptions: Overexpression of the tonoplast sugar transporter CmTST2 in melon fruit increases sugar accumulation.

item.title: CSA
item.description: Gene Details: MSU gene ID: LOC_Os01g16810 RAPdb gene ID: Os01g0274800 Gene Symbol: CSA Genome: MSU7 , IRGSP-1.

item.title: CsAGA2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Csa4G167980 Gene Symbol: CsAGA2 Gene Name: Alkaline α-galactosidase 2 Genome: Cucurbit Genomics Database Species: Cucumis sativus Functional Descriptions: Alkaline α-galactosidase 2 (CsAGA2) plays a pivotal role in mediating source–sink communication in cucumber.

item.title: CsDUO1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Cs1g03470 Gene Symbol: CsDUO1 Gene Name: DUO POLLEN 1 Genome: Species: Citrus sinensis Functional Descriptions: The miR159a-DUO1 module regulates pollen development by modulating auxin biosynthesis and starch metabolism in citrus.

item.title: CsINV5
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CsINV5 Gene Name: Vacuolar invertase 5 Genome: Species: Camellia sinensis Functional Descriptions: CsINV5, a tea vacuolar invertase gene enhances cold tolerance in transgenic Arabidopsis.

item.title: CsSEF1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CsSEF1 Gene Name: putative CCCH-type zinc finger protein Genome: Species: Cucumis sativus Functional Descriptions: Expression of CsSEF1 gene encoding putative CCCH zinc finger protein is induced by defoliation and prolonged darkness in cucumber fruit.

item.title: CsSTS1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CsSTS1 Gene Name: STACHYOSE SYNTHASE 1 Genome: Species: Cucumis sativus Functional Descriptions: Cucumber STACHYOSE SYNTHASE is regulated by its cis-antisense RNA asCsSTS to balance source–sink carbon partitioning.

item.title: CsSTS2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CsSTS2 Gene Name: STACHYOSE SYNTHASE 2 Genome: Species: Cucumis sativus Functional Descriptions: Cucumber STACHYOSE SYNTHASE is regulated by its cis-antisense RNA asCsSTS to balance source–sink carbon partitioning.

item.title: CsSTS3
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CsSTS3 Gene Name: STACHYOSE SYNTHASE 3 Genome: Species: Cucumis sativus Functional Descriptions: Cucumber STACHYOSE SYNTHASE is regulated by its cis-antisense RNA asCsSTS to balance source–sink carbon partitioning.

item.title: CsSUT1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CsSUT1 Gene Name: Sucrose Transporter 1 Genome: Species: Cucumis sativus Functional Descriptions: Down-regulation of the Sucrose Transporter CsSUT1 Causes Male Sterility by Altering Carbohydrate Supply.

item.title: CsSWEET17
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CsSWEET17 Gene Name: Sugars Will Eventually be Exported Transporter 17 Genome: Species: Camellia sinensis Functional Descriptions: CsSWEET1a and CsSWEET17 Mediate Growth and Freezing Tolerance by Promoting Sugar Transport across the Plasma Membrane.

item.title: CsSWEET1a
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CsSWEET1a Gene Name: Sugars Will Eventually be Exported Transporter 1 Genome: Species: Camellia sinensis Functional Descriptions: CsSWEET1a and CsSWEET17 Mediate Growth and Freezing Tolerance by Promoting Sugar Transport across the Plasma Membrane.

item.description: Gene Details: MSU gene ID: LOC_Os03g21540 RAPdb gene ID: Os03g0333200 Gene Symbol: DRUS1 FLR1 Genome: MSU7 , IRGSP-1.

item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Zm00001eb194220 Gene Symbol: Ereb17 Gene Name: AP2-EREBP-transcription factor 17 Genome: Zm-B73-REFERENCE-NAM-5.

item.title: F3GGT1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: F3GGT1 Gene Name: anthocyanidin 3-O-galactoside-2′’-O-xylosyltransferase Genome: Species: Actinidia chinensis Functional Descriptions: Identification and characterisation of F3GT1 and F3GGT1, two glycosyltransferases responsible for anthocyanin biosynthesis in red-fleshed kiwifruit.

item.title: F3GT1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: F3GT1 Gene Name: flavonoid 3-0-galactosyltransferase1 Genome: Species: Actinidia chinensis Functional Descriptions: Identification and characterisation of F3GT1 and F3GGT1, two glycosyltransferases responsible for anthocyanin biosynthesis in red-fleshed kiwifruit.

item.title: FaRIPK1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: FaRIPK1 Gene Name: red-initial protein kinase1 Genome: Species: Fragaria ananassa Functional Descriptions: Silencing FaRIPK1 expression by VIGS affects ripening-related processes and corresponding gene expression.

item.title: FaVPT1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: FaVPT1 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Fragaria ananassa Functional Description: Strawberry FaVPT1 transports Pi into vacuoles and promotes fruit ripening by sugar signaling.

item.title: FvebZIPs1.1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: FvebZIPs1.1 Gene Name: basic leucine zipper transcription factor s1.

item.title: GhCBL2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gh_A01G0740 Gene Symbol: GhCBL2 Gene Name: Genome: TM-1 reference genome Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: Overexpression of either GhCBL2, GhCIPK6, or GhTST2 was sufficient to promote sugar accumulation in transgenic cotton, whereas RNAi-mediated knockdown of GhCIPK6 expression or CRISPR-Cas9-mediated knockout of GhTST2 resulted in significantly decreased Glc content.

item.title: GhCIPK6
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gh_D06G1020 Gene Symbol: GhCIPK6 Gene Name: Genome: TM-1 reference genome Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: Overexpression of either GhCBL2, GhCIPK6, or GhTST2 was sufficient to promote sugar accumulation in transgenic cotton, whereas RNAi-mediated knockdown of GhCIPK6 expression or CRISPR-Cas9-mediated knockout of GhTST2 resulted in significantly decreased Glc content.

item.title: GhMYB212
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gorai.007G350500.1 Gene Symbol: GhMYB212 Gene Name: R2R3-MYB transcription factor 212 Genome: Phytozome v.

item.title: GhSCP2D
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gh_D06G0145 Gene Symbol: GhSCP2D Gene Name: Genome: genomes of G.

item.title: GhSWEET12
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gorai.005G195100 Gene Symbol: GhSWEET12 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: RNA-seq and protein−DNA binding assays revealed that GhMYB212 was closely linked to the pathways of sucrose and starch transportation and metabolism, directly controling the expression of a sucrose transporter gene GhSWEET12.

item.title: GhTST2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gh_D01G0848 Gene Symbol: GhTST2 Gene Name: Genome: TM-1 reference genome Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: Overexpression of either GhCBL2, GhCIPK6, or GhTST2 was sufficient to promote sugar accumulation in transgenic cotton, whereas RNAi-mediated knockdown of GhCIPK6 expression or CRISPR-Cas9-mediated knockout of GhTST2 resulted in significantly decreased Glc content.

item.title: GhVIN1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GhVIN1 Gene Name: vacuolar invertase1 Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: Silencing the vacuolar invertase gene GhVIN1 blocks cotton fiber initiation from the ovule epidermis, probably by suppressing a cohort of regulatory genes via sugar signaling.

item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.08G183500 Gene Symbol: GmSWEET10b Gene Name: Genome: Gmax_Wm82_a2_v1 Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: Simultaneous changes in seed size, oil content and protein content driven by selection of SWEET homologues during soybean domestication.

item.title: GmSWEET6
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.04G198600 Gene Symbol: GmSWEET6 Gene Name: Genome: Gmax_Wm82_a2_v1 Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: GmSWEET6, was functionally characterised in soybean, and its role in AM symbiosis was investigated via transgenic plants.

item.description: Gene Details: MSU gene ID: LOC_Os03g12790 RAPdb gene ID: Os03g0229500 Gene Symbol: GS3.

item.title: HvSUT1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: HORVU4Hr1G075200.3 Gene Symbol: HvSUT1 Gene Name: sucrose transporter 1 Genome: Species: Hordeum vulgare Functional Descriptions: Down-regulation of the sucrose transporters HvSUT1 and HvSUT2 affects sucrose homeostasis along its delivery path in barley grains.

item.title: HvSUT2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: HORVU5Hr1G000010.1 Gene Symbol: HvSUT2 Gene Name: sucrose transporter 2 Genome: Species: Hordeum vulgare Functional Descriptions: Down-regulation of the sucrose transporters HvSUT1 and HvSUT2 affects sucrose homeostasis along its delivery path in barley grains.

item.title: IbSnRK1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: IbSnRK1 Gene Name: sucrose non-fermenting-1-related protein kinase-1 Genome: Species: Ipomoea batatas Functional Descriptions: These findings indicate that IbSnRK1 improves starch content and quality through systematical up-regulation of the genes and the increase in key enzyme activities involved in starch biosynthesis pathway in transgenic sweet potato.

item.title: LeFRK2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: LeFRK2 Gene Name: fructokinase2 Genome: Species: Solanum lycopersicum Functional Descriptions: LeFRK2 is required for phloem and xylem differentiation and the transport of both sugar and water.

item.title: LeHT1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: LeHT1 Gene Name: hexose transporter 1 Genome: Species: Solanum lycopersicum Functional Descriptions: Involvement of the Hexose Transporter Gene LeHT1 and of Sugars in Resistance of Tomato to Tomato Yellow Leaf Curl Virus.

item.title: MaMADS36
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Ma05_g18560.1 Gene Symbol: MaMADS36 Gene Name: MADS-box transcription factor 36 Genome: banana A genome Species: Musa acuminata Functional Descriptions: Our findings revealed that MaMADS36 directly binds to the CA/T(r)G box of the MaBAM9b promoter to increase MaBAM9b transcription and, in turn, enzyme activity and starch degradation during ripening.

item.title: PbCPK28
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Pbr034839.1 Gene Symbol: PbCPK28 Gene Name: calcium-dependent protein kinase Genome: Species: Pyrus bretschneideri Functional Descriptions: Natural variations in the PbCPK28 promoter regulate sugar content through interaction with PbTST4 and PbVHA-A1 in pear.

item.title: PbrbZIP15
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: PbrbZIP15 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Pyrus bretschneideri Functional Descriptions: PbrbZIP15, was characterized from pear genome through the combined analyses of metabolite and transcriptome data followed by experimental validation.

item.title: PbTST4
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Pbr032130.1 Gene Symbol: PbTST4 Gene Name: tonoplast membrane sugar transporter Genome: Species: Pyrus bretschneideri Functional Descriptions: Furthermore, PbCPK28 interacts with and phosphorylates PbTST4, a proton antiporter, thereby coupling the sugar import into the vacuole with proton export.

item.title: SbMYB15
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: SbMYB15 Gene Name: R2R3 type MYB15 Genome: Species: Salicornia brachiata Functional Descriptions: Overexpression of a novel SbMYB15 from Salicornia brachiata confers salinity and dehydration tolerance by reduced oxidative damage and improved photosynthesis in transgenic tobacco.

item.title: SbSAI-2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: SbSAI-2 Gene Name: soluble acid invertase 2 Genome: Species: Sorghum bicolor Functional Descriptions: The sorghum soluble acid invertase gene SbSAI-2 was cloned and the function verified in Pichia pastoris and rice, showing the SbSAI-2 affects composition and content of sugar in stem juice.

item.title: SbSOS1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: SbSOS1 Gene Name: salt overly sensitive 1 Genome: Species: Salicornia brachiata Functional Descriptions: The SbSOS1 gene from the extreme halophyte Salicornia brachiata enhances Na+loading in xylem and confers salt tolerance in transgenic tobacco.

item.title: Sl-AGL11
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Solyc11g028020 Gene Symbol: Sl-AGL11 Gene Name: agamous-like MADS-box protein AGL11 Genome: Species: Solanum lycopersicum Functional Descriptions: Overexpression of the class D MADS-box gene Sl-AGL11 impacts fleshy tissue differentiation and structure in tomato fruits.

item.title: Sl-AKR9
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Solyc09g011240 Gene Symbol: Sl-AKR9 Gene Name: soluble NAD(P)(H) oxidoreductase Genome: Species: Solanum lycopersicum Functional Descriptions: Natural variations in the Sl-AKR9 aldo/keto reductase gene impact fruit flavor volatile and sugar contents.

item.title: SlARF10
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Solyc11g069500 Gene Symbol: SlARF10 Gene Name: auxin response factor 10 Genome: Species: Solanum lycopersicum Functional Descriptions: SlARF10, an auxin response factor, is involved in chlorophyll and sugar accumulation during tomato fruit development.

item.title: SlBES1.8
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Solyc10g076390 Gene Symbol: SlBES1.8 Gene Name: Brassinazole-resistant 1 Genome: Tomato Genome version SL4.

item.title: SlbZIP1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Solyc01g079480.3 Gene Symbol: SlbZIP1 Gene Name: Basic leucine zipper transcription factor 1 Genome: Species: Solanum lycopersicum Functional Descriptions: Induced mutations in the SC-uORF of the tomato transcription factor gene SlbZIP1 by the CRISPR/Cas9 system led to the high accumulation of sugar and amino acid contents in tomato fruits.

item.title: SlGRAS9
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Solyc06g036170 Gene Symbol: SlGRAS9 Gene Name: GRAS transcription factor 9 Genome: Species: Solanum lycopersicum Functional Descriptions: The SlGRAS9-SlZHD17 transcriptional cascade regulates chlorophyll and carbohydrate metabolism contributing to fruit quality traits in tomato.

item.title: SlHSP21.5A
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Solyc03g113930 Gene Symbol: SlHSP21.5A Gene Name: heat shock protein 21 Genome: Species: Solanum lycopersicum Functional Descriptions: WHIRLY1 Regulates HSP21.

item.title: SlJUL

item.title: SlMYB1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Solyc09g011780 Gene Symbol: SlMYB1 Gene Name: MYB transcription factor 1 Genome: Species: Solanum lycopersicum Functional Descriptions: SlMYB1 regulates the accumulation of lycopene, fruit shape, and resistance to Botrytis cinerea in tomato.

item.title: SlSWEET14
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Solyc03g097560 Gene Symbol: SlSWEET14 Gene Name: Genome: Tomato Genome version SL4.

item.title: SlSWEET15
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Solyc09g074530 Gene Symbol: SlSWEET15 Gene Name: sugars will eventually be exported transporter 15 Genome: Species: Solanum lycopersicum Functional Descriptions: Transporter SlSWEET15 unloads sucrose from phloem and seed coat for fruit and seed development in tomato.

item.title: StSP6A
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: PGSC0003DMT400060057 Gene Symbol: StSP6A Gene Name: SELF-PRUNING 6A Genome: Species: Solanum tuberosum Functional Descriptions: The tuberization signal StSP6A represses flower bud development in potato.

item.title: StSP6A
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: StSP6A Gene Name: Genome: Species: Solanum tuberosum Functional Description: The direct physical interaction between StSWEET11 and StSP6A proteins represents a link between the sugar and photoperiodic pathways for the regulation of potato tuber formation.

item.title: StTINY3
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Soltu.DM.03G035540.1 Gene Symbol: StTINY3 Gene Name: CBF/DREB transcription factor3 Genome: Species: Solanum tuberosum Functional Descriptions: The transcription factor StTINY3 enhances cold-induced sweetening resistance by coordinating starch resynthesis and sucrose hydrolysis in potato.

item.title: StTST3.1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Soltu.DM.02G022370.1 Gene Symbol: StTST3.1 Gene Name: TST3-type isoform Genome: Species: Solanum tuberosum Functional Descriptions: Suppression of the tonoplast sugar transporter, StTST3.

item.title: StTST3.2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Soltu.DM.03G003220.1 Gene Symbol: StTST3.2 Gene Name: TST3-type isoform Genome: Species: Solanum tuberosum Functional Descriptions: Suppression of the tonoplast sugar transporter StTST3.

item.title: SWEET12c
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Solyc05g024260 Gene Symbol: SWEET12c Gene Name: Sugars Will Eventually be Exported Transporter Genome: Species: Solanum lycopersicum Functional Descriptions: Further analyses suggested that HY5 represses the accumulation of sugar in tomato fruit by activating Sugars Will Eventually be Exported Transporter (SWEET12c) expression.
